creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
dimension: 14 × 9 3/4 in. (35.56 × 24.7 cm) (image, sheet, vertical ōban, each)
medium: Woodblock prints (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: in toshidama cartouche on each sheet: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
text: The play was performed at Nakamuraza in 1853.
title: Scene from the Kabuki Play, Yowa nasake ukina no yokogushi
